body.name: deweisn Trifold Lighted Vanity Makeup Mirror with 21 LEDs Lights,1x/2x/3x Magnification and Touch Screen Dimming,Two Power Supplies Makeup Mirror, Gift for Women

features: 【 21 HIGH-BRIGHTNESS LEDS 】- After continuous experimentation and simulation, 21l natural light led makeup mirrors can provide better light for makeup. Even in a very dark environment, LED lighting can provide accurate natural light, provide you with a perfect field of vision, highlight your details. The light is naturally soft, bright but not dazzling, and it can also protect your eyes.

【 HD MIRROR & 1X/2X/3X MAGNIFICATION 】- The high definition glass, 3 mirror panels to provide a wide viewing angle, can see the facial features more clearly, very suitable for the more detailed make up like applying eyeliner, mascara, lip liner and eyeshadow and more. NOTE: To focus the magnifying mirror, bring it to within 11" of your eye.

【 TOUCH CONTROL & TRI-FOLD DESIGN 】- This vanity mirror features a high-sensitivity touch button design. LED lights brightness control by the touch sensor switch, and just touch the sensor switch to dim or bright the LED lights. Tri-fold design allows you to open or close at your will and it’s also dustproof and anti-scratch. Convenient for daily maintenance and carry-on.

【 90° ROTATION & DOUBLE POWER SUPPLY 】 - The professional tabletop mirror can be rotated 90°, can be fixed in any position to give comfortable viewing angle. The mirror operated by Micro USB cable supply or 4 AAA batteries, whether you are at home or outdoor, it is very practical.( battery not included, usb wire included, pls noted the mirror can't store power by itself).

【 LARGE CAPACITY & STORAGE BASE 】- The new mirror base has a larger storage capacity, and a cosmetic brush groove is also designed to facilitate storage of accessories( lipsticks, earrings, rings, necklaces, watches) and cosmetic brushes. The exquisite exterior design makes it an ideal gift for mother, sister, wife, girlfriend, makeup artist, etc. on Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, Birthday or other special occasions.
body.description: Dual power mode power supply - can be used at any time. Powered by USB cable or 4 AAA batteries. Whether you are on the road, school or at home, this mirror can be easily put in your suitcase, backpack or just carry it around. And can makeup anywhere in your house, office or while camping. When you do not need it, pls turn off to save electricity. The mirror can't store power by itself. Do not power it by USB charging and battery at the same time. This product is only fits with power adapter DC5 V / 0.5 A-1 A-2 A or you can connect with your other devices like PC, power bank with standard usb interface.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: deweisn LED MAKEUP MIRROR! As a makeup mirror manufacturer, We are proud to bring beautiful to your daily routines. Our vanity mirrors combine aesthetics with practicality and usefulness, to render a one-of-a-kind makeup experience - so you can look your best wherever you are. 3 mirror panels to provide a wide viewing angle, very suitable for the more detailed make up like applying eyeliner, mascara, lip liner and eyeshadow and more.

Magnification 3X 2X 1X 3 Panels magnifying and a wide-angle viewing for you to see clearly your facial features,make a more perfect makeup with each detail taken care of. 90° Free Adjustment The desktop mirror can be freely rotated by 90° and can be fixed in any position to provide a comfortable angle for makeup. 21 High-quality LEDs, Smart touch buttons to meet your daily needs with different brightness. Adopting a high-sensitivity touch button design, just touch the sensor switch to dim or bright the LED lights, and adjust the brightness easily. 21pcs LED makeup mirrors can provide better light for makeup. Even in a dark environment, it can provide accurate natural light. How to assemble? 1. Align the base and the stand of the main mirror,with the tray and the main mirror facing the same direction. 2. Insert the main mirror stand into the base,keep the base recess in front of you. 3. Ensure the main mirror and the base are connected securely.

Upgrade base - Groove design - Easier to remove and store makeup brushes and jewelry accessories. Tri-fold design allows you to open or close at your will and it’s also dust-proof and anti-scratch. Convenient for daily maintenance. Keep the desktop tidy and save time searching for items. You can quickly use makeup brushes, lipsticks, earrings, rings, necklaces and watches, etc. Exquisite appearance - Perfect gift for wife, mother, girl and friends.

Package Include: 1* Cosmetic mirror1* USB cable1* User manual(English) Dual power mode power supply - can be used at any time. Powered by USB cable or 4 AAA batteries. Whether you are on the road, school or at home, this mirror can be easily put in your suitcase, backpack or just carry it around. And can makeup anywhere in your house, office or while camping. When you do not need it, pls turn off to save electricity. The mirror can't store power by itself. Do not power it by USB charging and battery at the same time. This product is only fits with power adapter DC5 V / 0.5 A-1 A-2 A or you can connect with your other devices like PC, power bank with standard usb interface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a very nice mirror, I loved the size and design, it has the functionality of being used with battery or connected. The lighting is excellent, it does not have the function of regulating the intensity of the light but it illuminates quite well. I love that it has 4 mirrors with different image enlargement, it is very beautiful and practical, its design is compact and there are different colors to chose from over all excellent purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vanity Mirror - No great for travel, but great for regular use
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is a bit bulky, in my opinion, so not the best for travel. It is about the length and width of a large school text book, but it's light. I can carry it in my hand with several other items with no problem. The lights are very bright. They have 3 settings so you can adjust the lighting. I currently use this in my very low lit bathroom and it's been a life saver. The largest mirror is a standard mirror, but the others are magnifying, which is both scary (those pores lol), and amazing. The stand at the bottom is sturdy. Easy to store because it's narrow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product! can lean back. Has X2 and X3 squares.wouldn't recommend for traveling because once you put it on the stand it doesn't come apart.The only thing I would change is that the battery cover is really hard to get off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Add this to your makeup vanity
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived fairly quickly packaging was simple item can in two pieces. You just need to snap the mirror to the base. Good option to either plug in power source or make it portable with battery option. The lights are only in the main portion of mirror. Though if lights were around the entire trim then I wouldn’t have a complaint for this mirror. I like the different magnifying mirror option up to 3x I believe. Overall good item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teenager loves it
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my teenage daughter this past holiday season and she said it's her favorite gift. Pretty sure she uses every day she leaves the house. It is effective, portable, and bright. Nothing but five stars here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mirror.
reviews.reviewText: I use this mirror to get ready almost every single day. The lights are nice and bright and it folds up nice and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke within a couple weeks
reviews.reviewText: The overall quality is okay. It worked great for a couple weeks and then the light quit working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this purchase. The lights are the right brightness and the size of the mirror makes it easy to transport. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Was smaller than I expected. Light is good. Just wish I could adjust the height. Angle tilt can be moved but not height - that’s why only 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this mirror because it is so clear to see when putting on my make-up…the lights are bright and it looks great on my dressing table

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Mirror is great reflection is clear Lights are bright

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: a perfect gift for my daughter
reviews.reviewText: This product was lovely and presented in a very nice box a perfect gift for my daughter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 3, 2021
